short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SaveClip is a great Instagram Downloader that allows to save and download Video, Photo, Story, IG Reels, Highlights from Instagram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"SaveClip" is a useful extension that allows users to easily save and download Instagram Photos or Videos directly on the web browser.

Main Features:
- SaveInsta Video: Download Insta videos in HD quality
- SaveInsta Photo: Download IG photos in full size
- SaveInsta Story: Save Stories and Highlights with just one click.
- SaveInsta Audio: Download audio on Insta as mp3.
- SaveInsta Reels: Download Reels and IGTV videos in the highest quality.

How to use SaveInsta on Chrome browser?
1. Open the Chrome browser and go to Instagram.com.
2. Navigate to the photo or video you want to download.
3. Click the "Download" icon at the bottom of the video.
4. A website will open in a new tab. Here the photos or videos you want to download will appear and you can save them to your device.

Note:
After installing the extension, please reload the tab where you want to download the video so that the extension can recognize the video file!

We'd love to see your feedback or suggestions to improve the extension's performance! Please contact us with any problems or suggestions.
